summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 6th Avenue South, (East Side Only), from Spokane Street to Hanford Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15039 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
